item.title: Love Is Walking Hand In Hand: The Peanuts Gang Defines Love, 1965
item.description:
Love Is Walking Hand In Hand: The Peanuts Gang Defines Love, 1965

The Peanuts series by Charles M. Schulz endures as one of the most beloved cartoons of all time, partly because of Schulz's gift for capturing the great, tender truths of human existence through remarkably simple, sometimes poetic, often humorous, always profound vignettes.
